name: Come_Back_Home
description:
In this game, the player needs to do is to find the right portal key, open the corresponding door and find the way home.

made by Chunxin Zhang from lab 02 via unity

Please refer to this link for the basic game idea：

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1RDF79HQTi-3ZqIlekNJLIlZtMkTx7WnG/view?usp=shari...

I think there are too many ideas in the design, so that the game as a whole seems to have too many elements, and can not highlight any game play and game mechanics, so in the final product modified a large number of elements, only retain the teleportation and organs, and find the key to open the door these basic.
